Text Blocks

Paragraph

p.lead Carrie, Moss! First scene in Carrie! Oh. Okay I'm a 32 year old IT-man who works in a basement. Yes, I do the whole Lonely Hearts thing! From today, dialing 999 won't get you the Emergency Services, and that's not the only thing that's changing! You know, it's high tide. But we're not on the coast. I'm closed for maintenance! Closed for maintenance? I've fallen to the communists! Well, they do have some strong arguments. A gay musical, called Gay. That's quite gay. Gay musical? Aren't all musicals gay? This must be, like, the gayest musical ever. Might want to play a bit hard to get. Hello? I've had a bit of a tumble.

With a Header

It's Me! I was the turkey all along

Carrie, Moss! First scene in Carrie! Oh. Okay I'm a 32 year old IT-man who works in a basement. Yes, I do the whole Lonely Hearts thing! From today, dialing 999 won't get you the Emergency Services, and that's not the only thing that's changing! You know, it's high tide. But we're not on the coast. I'm closed for maintenance! Closed for maintenance? I've fallen to the communists! Well, they do have some strong arguments. A gay musical, called Gay. That's quite gay. Gay musical? Aren't all musicals gay? This must be, like, the gayest musical ever. Might want to play a bit hard to get. Hello? I've had a bit of a tumble.

It's Me! I was the turkey all along

Without a Header

Carrie, Moss! First scene in Carrie! Oh. Okay I'm a 32 year old IT-man who works in a basement. Yes, I do the whole Lonely Hearts thing! From today, dialing 999 won't get you the Emergency Services, and that's not the only thing that's changing! You know, it's high tide. But we're not on the coast. I'm closed for maintenance! Closed for maintenance? I've fallen to the communists! Well, they do have some strong arguments. A gay musical, called Gay. That's quite gay. Gay musical? Aren't all musicals gay? This must be, like, the gayest musical ever. Might want to play a bit hard to get. Hello? I've had a bit of a tumble.
